fullplot: Jean has been married to Francoise for years, but his relationship with his wife has been all but over for a long time. She's hardly ever around, always traveling to Russia for work, and she drifts in and out of the film as well, reflecting the ephemeral nature of their marriage.

title: We Won't Grow Old Together
writers: Maurice Pialat (based on the novel by)
